body.name: CARPETNAL White Dresser, Modern Dresser for Bedroom, 6 Drawer Double with Wide Drawers and Metal Handles, Wood Dressers & Chest of Hallway, Entryway.
features: Unique Design: The white finish, gold handles, and then adding concave and convex lines to the simple engineered wood panel, which is making this dresser for bedroom even more unique and charming, with a certain sense of fun and premium beauty. It can easily match any interior style, providing a simple, spacious organizer and storage solution for your home.

6 Drawer Ample Storage Space: This white dresser has 6 spacious drawers that provide ample storage space to sort and store your and your family's clothes, makeup, photo albums or other personal items. The top of the dressing table can place decorations such as green plants, aromatherapy or mirrors. Make your room more neat and beautiful. Say goodbye to chaos. Overall Dimension:47.25''(L)x 15.75''(W)x29.35''(H).

Sturdy and Stable: This white dresser for bedroom is made of high quality certified MDF and tapered metal legs for sturdy and durable finish. Each drawer is equipped with smooth sliding system, making this 6 drawer dresser waterproof, scratch-resistant, wear-resistant, easy to push and pull, durable and easy to clean. Metal tapered legs provide stable and secure support for the entire dresser. so you can rest assured that you will have years of use.

Multi Purpose Dresser: Offers a variety of placement options for your room, not only as a storage cabinet in the bedroom, but also as a home decoration, he can be placed in the living room, bedroom, hallway. The dresser is perfect for placing your CD player and Xbox. The top surface can be used as a catch all table to put your books, makeup or display decorative items.

Assembly and Customer Service: From the customer's point of view, we use the most simple and convenient way to satisfy customers. The dresser has clearly-labeled assembly parts and illustrated instructions, which can make assembly fast. Quality assurance, if you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us, we will do our best to make customers satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ms. Bob the Builder
reviews.reviewText: First off let’s start with the tools you’ll need because I didn’t see anyone go over that.You will need : 1 Phillips screw-driver & a mini one (small)The dress is about 76-79 pounds so please be careful. It is sturdy though!Instructions are interesting. The most time consuming one was STEP 11. If you get help that’s great! If not, you got this! It takes patience just take your time!Now let’s go to the actual review : Honestly from reading the reviews, most people only spent 2 hours working on this. However, if you’re like me, someone who wants others to build things and doesn’t know much about tools but had to do it themselves, this took A LONG TIME (ex : 5-7 hours).It is also huge. I’m not sure why some of the reviews say that it’s small. I guess it depends on the person plus I’m in a 1 bedroom apartment if that helps. It does take up a lot of space which I was a bit surprised of, but I did make it work!Thanks to The Real Housewives franchise I was able to accomplish this myself in 7 hours. Of course I did take a break to eat chocolate cake.It honestly looks fantastic and I am proud of my accomplishment! The picture doesn’t do it justice (btw the sun is just shining on it)I hope this helps for anyone who is looking for a dresser!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dresser for baby nursery
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised at the quality of this dresser for price. Yes it's composite wood but it is very sturdy and the hardware is very nice. It took us about 3 hours to assemble. It is a bit tedious to put together but everything fit together very nicely without any issues. We are using this in our baby nursery as a changing table. The finished look is very nice and great for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful dresserSetup was easy but took around 3 hours to assembleOverall satisfactory

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice but came damaged.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered dresser and two parts were damaged in the box. I did reach out to support and they were nice enough to send me a new dresser. The replacement unfortunately was damaged as well. Beautiful dresser though. takes about 2 -3 hours to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Love this dresser. Took about two hours for my husband to put together. Very study. Some reviews complained of the height but if you look at all the pictures it shows the measurements. Perfect size for what I wanted in my closet. Great quality for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's cute for a 5ft 0in person it's perfect. Is a Lil on the smaller side but better then nothing. It's good to start somewhere. Quality is nice look my man 45mins to build

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Total disappointment: this kind of items should not be sold in the market
reviews.reviewText: I have redone all my home furniture and bought lots of new items, everyone required from 20 minutes to a couple of hours to assemble. I am handy and used to this, but this furniture it's impossible, more than 200 screws it's just insane and even following the instructions I had to re-do the work 3 times, in the end realising that some instructions are confusing. I understand there could be a small company behind and feel sorry for them, but if you guys are not ready to approach the market take more time and fix your items because you can't waste other people time. The item isn't stable, one of the drawer is broken and evenif I tried to fix it, it won't work: really I got trapped, lost 6 hours time and will have to unscrew everything and send back. Very disappointed because I live 5 floors walk-up and to return this, it's really a burden. I will have to return anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent looking dresser but, it is not sturdy and the directions are not beginner friendly. You will need to take your time and look at the pictures several times. First, make sure all pieces are accounted for before you begin (that's common practice with any build) the low stars is fir the lack of direction. I am somewhat of an expert putting together pieces through years of experience. The directions fail to tell you that one set of drawers goes on the right and the other on the left. Figured that out myself. I also took off star for the materials. Enthroned other than the frame and drawer fonts are flimsy cardboard. I don't see this lasting long. Not the way my kids cram their clothes in.
